hero.title: We transform your ideas into
hero.subtitle: 3D printing specialists, we offer rapid prototyping solutions and high-quality production with FDM and SLA technologies.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Our 3D solutions
services.description: We offer a complete range of 3D printing, scanning and prototyping services to transform your ideas into real objects with precision and professional quality.
services.contactToday: Contact us today to discuss your 3D printing project and receive a personalized quote.
services.heroSubtitle: Complete 3D printing, scanning and prototyping solutions to transform your ideas into reality.

fdm.title: FDM 3D Printing
fdm.description: Fused Deposition Modeling (FDM) technology is ideal for producing functional prototypes and durable parts. We use professional 3D printers to ensure maximum quality and precision.
features: Wide range of available materials (PLA, ABS, PETG, TPU, Nylon, etc.)
Print dimensions up to 300x300x300mm
Resolution up to 100 microns per layer
Ideal for functional prototypes, mechanical parts and small production runs
Fast delivery times and competitive prices

materials.name: PETG-CF
materials.applications: Mechanical parts, functional components with carbon fiber

materials.name: Nylon-CF
materials.applications: Mechanical parts, functional components with carbon fiber

sla.title: SLA 3D Printing
sla.description: Stereolithography (SLA) technology uses photopolymerization to create objects with incredibly precise details and smooth surfaces. Perfect for detailed models, jewelry and medical applications.
features: Ultra-fine resolution up to 10 microns for incredibly precise details
Smooth surfaces requiring minimal post-production
Variety of special resins for specific applications
Ideal for aesthetic prototypes, presentation models and precision components
Excellent for producing transparent parts or with minute details

laser.title: Laser Cutting
laser.description: Our laser engraving and cutting technology offers an advanced solution for creating detailed and personalized projects. Thanks to a high-speed CoreXY movement system and a powerful 22W laser with an ultra-fine point, we guarantee precise engravings and cuts on a wide range of materials. The 400 × 415 mm work area allows handling projects of different sizes while always maintaining high quality.
features: Precision: Movement with 0.01 mm accuracy for sharp details
Speed: Up to 600 mm/s, optimizing production times
Ultra-fine laser point: For maximum precision engravings
CoreXY system: Advanced technology for fast and accurate movements
Work area: 400 × 415 mm for various project sizes
Compatible materials: Wood, acrylic, leather, fabrics, paper, and other materials

applications.name: Personalization
applications.description: Personalization of objects and gadgets with precise and detailed engravings.

applications.name: Prototyping
applications.description: Creation of prototypes and architectural models with clean and precise cuts.

applications.name: Decorations
applications.description: Creation of decorations and handcrafted items tailored to every need.

applications.name: Modeling
applications.description: Production of elements for modeling and hobbies with millimetric details.

largePrint.title: Large Format Printing
largePrint.description: We offer a professional large format printing service, ideal for producing technical drawings, presentations, posters and maps. We use a thermal inkjet printer with resolution up to 2400 × 1200 dpi, ensuring high-quality prints with vivid colors and precise details. The ability to handle media up to 609 mm wide allows the creation of large-scale projects.
features: Resolution: Up to 2400 × 1200 dpi for sharp images and readable text
Supported formats: Sheets and rolls up to 609 mm wide, including A1, A2, A3 and A4 formats
Technology: Thermal inkjet printer for professional quality
Compatible materials: Plain, coated, photographic, adhesive paper and other special media
Speed: Fast printing with reduced production times to meet deadlines
Quality: Vivid colors and precise details for professional results

applications.name: Technical Projects
applications.description: Printing of architectural and engineering projects with millimetric precision.

applications.name: Promotional Materials
applications.description: Creation of posters and promotional materials with high visual impact.

applications.name: Cartography
applications.description: Creation of detailed maps and floor plans for professional use.

applications.name: Presentations
applications.description: Production of visual presentations for high-level events and conferences.

scanning.title: 3D Scanning
scanning.description: Our 3D scanning services allow digitizing physical objects with millimetric precision, creating detailed 3D models ready for processing, modification or printing.
features: Professional high-definition 3D scanners
Precision up to 0.1mm to capture every detail
Advanced point cloud processing
Conversion to different file formats (STL, OBJ, STEP, etc.)
Ideal for reverse engineering, documentation, digital preservation

applications.name: Reverse Engineering
applications.description: We recreate parts no longer in production or difficult to find.

applications.name: Quality Control
applications.description: We compare the produced piece with the original CAD model.

applications.name: Digital Preservation
applications.description: We digitally preserve objects of historical or artistic value.

applications.name: Customization
applications.description: Acquisition of organic shapes to create custom products.

prototyping.title: Prototyping
prototyping.description: We transform your ideas into functional prototypes quickly. From the conceptual phase to physical realization, we support you in every phase of the product development process.
features: Design consulting for prototype optimization
Rapid iteration to perfect the design
Functional testing and concept validation
Small pre-production series production
Complete support from sketch to final product

process.title: Prototype production

process.title: Testing & Validation
process.description: We test the prototype to verify its functionality and adherence to specifications.

process.title: Iteration & Refinement

design.title: Design

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Our passion for innovation and 3D technology
about.description: We are a team of 3D printing specialists with years of experience in the industry. Our mission is to transform your ideas into reality through advanced technologies and superior quality service.
about.heroSubtitle: A team of passionate 3D printing experts, dedicated to transforming your ideas into reality.
about.storyParagraph1: 3DMAKES was born in 2024 from the intuition of Marco Pagani, 20 years old with a strong passion for computer science, particularly 3D printing. Starting from a small room with two 3D printers, the company has grown to become an established reality in the additive manufacturing sector.
about.storyParagraph2: Our mission has always been clear: to make 3D printing technology accessible to everyone, from large companies to small artisans, from designers to technology enthusiasts.
about.storyParagraph3: Today, with a team of qualified professionals and cutting-edge equipment, we offer a complete service of 3D printing, scanning, design and consulting, always keeping quality, innovation and customer care at the center.
about.valuesDescription: We firmly believe in some fundamental principles that guide every aspect of our work and our relationship with customers.
about.sustainabilityDescription: We are committed to reducing the environmental impact of our production processes. We use sustainable materials where possible and optimize our productions to minimize waste.
about.teamDescription: A team of passionate and highly qualified professionals ready to transform your ideas into concrete reality.
about.locationDescription: We are easily accessible in the center of Lugano. Come visit us to discuss your project or to see our 3D printing processes up close.

values.innovationDescription: We constantly seek the most innovative solutions to offer our customers cutting-edge results. We invest in the latest generation technologies and continuously update our skills.
values.qualityDescription: Quality is at the center of everything we do. We use only selected materials and rigorous production processes to ensure that every piece we produce meets the highest quality standards.

marco.name: Marco Pagani
marco.bio: Computer scientist passionate about 3D printing, always looking for innovative solutions for his company
Specialized in 3D modeling and print optimization

manuel.name: Manuel Gösteris
manuel.bio: Takes care of customer relationships and the consulting process

alessandro.name: Luganoo Genovesi
alessandro.bio: Specialized in 3D modeling and print optimization

alessandro1.name: Luganoo Belino
alessandro1.bio: Specialized in 3D modeling and print optimization

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.subtitle: Making 3D printing technology accessible to everyone and promoting its adoption in every sector.
mission.description: Our mission is to make 3D printing technology accessible to everyone, offering high-quality services at competitive prices.
mission.revolutionTitle: Revolutionizing the world of production with 3D printing
mission.paragraph1: At 3DMAKES, we believe that 3D printing represents a technological revolution destined to radically transform the way we conceive, design and produce the objects around us.
mission.paragraph2: Our mission is to lead this revolution, making 3D printing technology accessible and understandable to as many people as possible: from professionals to companies, from students to simple enthusiasts.
mission.commitmentDescription: We are committed every day to spreading knowledge and use of 3D printing through various initiatives and approaches.
mission.visionTitle: A future where 3D printing is part of everyday life
mission.visionParagraph1: We imagine a future where 3D printing will no longer be a niche technology, but an integral part of the production processes of every company and the daily life of each of us.
mission.visionParagraph2: A world where objects are produced on demand, reducing waste and environmental impact, where customization is the norm and not the exception, where geographical distances no longer represent an obstacle to production.
mission.visionParagraph3: This is the vision that guides us every day and that drives us to constantly innovate, to explore new possibilities and to share our knowledge with the world.
mission.discoverVision: Discover how we realize this vision
mission.learnWithUs: Learn the technology of the future with us
mission.eventsDescription: We regularly organize training events and practical workshops to bring more and more people closer to the world of 3D printing.
mission.introWorkshopDesc: A practical 3-hour workshop to discover the fundamentals of 3D printing, from modeling to final printing.
mission.advancedCourseDesc: A complete 5-lesson course to deepen 3D modeling techniques with professional software.
mission.masterclassDesc: An intensive 2-day masterclass for professionals who want to master advanced techniques.

knowledge.title: Knowledge dissemination
knowledge.description: We organize workshops, webinars and training courses to spread knowledge of 3D printing and its potential applications.

innovation.title: Accessible innovation
innovation.description: We are committed to making 3D printing technologies accessible to everyone, offering competitive prices and scalable solutions.

sustainability.title: Environmental sustainability
sustainability.description: We promote the use of eco-sustainable materials and production processes with low environmental impact to contribute to a greener future.

community.title: Collaboration and community
community.description: We believe in the power of collaboration and sharing. We work to build a community of enthusiasts and 3D printing professionals.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Ready for your next project? Let's talk about it together
contact.thankYouMessage: Thank you for contacting us. We will respond as soon as possible.
contact.helpRealizeIdeas: We are here to help you realize your ideas. Contact us to discuss your project or to receive more information about our services.

calculator.title: Quote Calculator
calculator.subtitle: Get an instant quote for your project
calculator.dragDrop: Drag your STL file here or click to select
calculator.howItWorks: Our calculator uses an algorithm that considers various factors such as object dimensions, chosen material, print quality and quantity to provide a quick cost estimate.
calculator.accuracy: The generated quote is an indicative estimate that may vary by ±15% from the final cost. Accuracy depends on object complexity, specific characteristics and any required post-processing.
calculator.fileFormats: We accept the most common file formats for 3D printing, including STL, OBJ, STEP and 3MF. If you have a different format, contact us to verify if we can process it or to receive conversion support.
calculator.deliveryTimes: Delivery times vary based on object complexity, chosen material and quantity. For standard prints, average times are 3-5 working days, while more complex projects may require 7-10 days.
calculator.modelModification: Yes, we offer 3D file optimization and modification services. If your model needs corrections, minimum thicknesses, supports or other modifications to ensure successful printing, we can intervene to optimize it.
calculator.fileUploadedSuccess: The file {fileName} has been uploaded successfully.
calculator.fileTooBig: File too large (max {maxSize}MB). For larger files, contact us.
calculator.unsupportedFormat: Unsupported file format. Use STL, OBJ or 3MF.

calculator.minOrderError: The minimum price for an order is {minPrice}€. Increase the quantity or contact us for smaller orders.
calculator.singlePieceCost: The cost per single piece is lower, but a minimum of {minPrice} CHF per order applies.
calculator.aiCalculatorDesc: This is an automatic AI calculator that is constantly learning to provide increasingly precise price indications. The generated price is relative and may vary based on automatic file arrangement, optimal print settings and other technical factors.
calculator.step1Desc: Upload your 3D file in STL, OBJ or 3MF format. Our viewer will show you a preview and automatically detect dimensions.
calculator.step2Desc: Choose between FDM or SLA printing, select quality, material and infill percentage based on your needs.
calculator.step3Desc: Our AI algorithm will automatically calculate an indicative estimate based on dimensions, material and quality. This is only a preliminary estimate.
calculator.step4Desc: Access the Client Area, upload the desired file and request a quote. In less than 24 hours you will receive the precise offer that you can accept or reject.

footer.description: We transform your ideas into real objects through 3D printing technology.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Answers to the most common questions about our services
faq.accuracy: How accurate is the generated quote?
faq.fileFormats: What file formats do you accept for 3D printing?
faq.deliveryTimes: How long does a 3D printing order take?
faq.modelModification: Is it possible to modify my 3D model before printing?
faq.fdmMaterials: What materials do you offer for 3D printing?
faq.fdmMaterialsAnswer: We offer a wide range of materials including PLA, PETG, ABS, TPU, Nylon and carbon fiber reinforced filaments. For high precision applications, we also offer resin printing services.
faq.deliveryTimesAnswer: Delivery times depend on various factors such as size, complexity and quantity of parts. Standard orders are completed in 2-5 working days. Rush services are available for priority projects.
faq.maxSize: What is the maximum print size?
faq.maxSizeAnswer: Our FDM printers can produce parts up to 350×350×400mm in a single piece. Larger objects can be printed in sections and assembled.
faq.scanningPrecision: What is the precision of your 3D scanning service?
faq.scanningPrecisionAnswer: Our professional scanners achieve precision up to 0.1mm based on object size and complexity. We can capture both geometry and texture information.
faq.largeObjectsAnswer: Yes, we can scan objects of various sizes. For large objects, we use multiple scans that are then combined into a single 3D model.
faq.priceCalculationAnswer: Prices are based on material volume, print time and complexity. Factors include material type, quality settings and post-processing requirements. Use our online calculator for instant quotes.
faq.bulkDiscounts: Do you offer discounts for bulk orders?
faq.bulkDiscountsAnswer: Yes, we offer discounts for bulk orders. 5+ pieces receive a 10% discount, and 10+ pieces receive a 15% discount. Contact us for custom quotes on large orders.
faq.qualityControl: What quality control measures do you adopt?
faq.qualityControlAnswer: Every print undergoes rigorous quality control, including dimensional verification and visual inspection. We provide test prints for critical applications and maintain strict quality control standards.
faq.designAssistanceAnswer: Yes, our team can help optimize designs for 3D printing, suggest appropriate materials and provide technical consulting throughout the project.
